If this happens, you will be 
given medicines to induce 
the labour. This is the safest 
way of delivering the baby. It 
also means that you and your 
partner can see and hold the 
baby at birth if you want to. It 
is devastating to experience a 
stillbirth or neonatal death.
You and your partner are 
likely to experience a range 
of emotions that come and 
go unpredictably. These can 
include disbelief, anger, guilt 
and grief. Some women think 
they can hear their baby crying,
